name: Legendary: Ultimate Ninjas
description:
The high-profile mobile game《Legendary: Ultimate Ninjas》is coming soon!

The classic storyline reappears, brilliant fighting combos, multiple gameplay, waiting for you to unlock!

Game features:
1. Unlock 100+ legendary ninjas, form this strongest lineup
2. Revisit classic ninjutsu skills, experience super skill combos！
3. You can play any role you like, train and upgrade to become the king of ninjas！
4. Brand new gameplay for a fresh experience, experience tons of features!
5. No-frills idle gameplay,login and collect rewards！

Join the battle with your favorite ninja! Download 《Legendary: Ultimate Ninjas》now!
